name: CHICKEN GUN!
description:
CHICKEN GUN! The chicken has been tired of being bullied by Ducks,Eagles and Pigeons so now After years of training the chicken can fly. But the other birds refuse to accept it, and now you have to prove to them that chickens are a force to recon with!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                               AVAILABLE ON  

Scratch

    &

Itch.IO

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CHCKEN GUN on scratch

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS

W-A-S-D OR ARROW KEYS TO MOVE

CLICK OR SPACE TO SHOOT

PRESS THE QUIT BUTTON TO BE SATISFIED
